scripts.clean-html-converter: shx rm -rf src/HtmlConverter/bin && shx rm -rf src/HtmlConverter/obj
scripts.clean-web-app: shx rm -rf src/WebApp/fableBuild && shx rm -rf src/WebApp/bin && shx rm -rf src/WebApp/obj && shx rm -rf src/WebApp/output
scripts.clean-tests: shx rm -rf tests/fableBuild && shx rm -rf tests/bin && shx rm -rf tests/obj && shx rm -rf src/WebApp/output
scripts.watch-tests-mocha: cd tests && shx mkdir fableBuild && nodemon --watch fableBuild --delay 100ms --exec "npx mocha -r esm -r mocha.env.js --reporter dot --recursive fableBuild"
scripts.pretests: npm run clean-tests && cd tests && dotnet fable --outDir fableBuild
scripts.tests: cd tests && npx mocha -r esm -r mocha.env.js --reporter dot --recursive fableBuild
scripts.build: cd src/WebApp && dotnet fable --outDir fableBuild && npx webpack --mode production
